THE AUTHOR’S EPITAPH

First made a Farmer’s Boy, and then a snob,
A poet he became, and here lies Bob.
(1)
[From the title page of The Birds’ and Insects’ Post Office British Library, Add. MS. 30809, f. 11.]

April 1823

Notes

1.. [From the title page of The Birds’ and Insects’ Post Office British Library, Add. MS. 30809, f. 11.] [back]
